Description:
Impressive Space, Outstanding Style!
With its quality enhancements, northerly outlook and abundance of natural light, this fabulous first-floor apartment makes an ideal first home or blue-ribbon investment opportunity close to everything that counts. Surprisingly generous interior features a central hallway accessing two double bedrooms (both with BIRs), stylish bathroom with stone-top vanity and floor-to-ceiling tiles, separate WC. Add to this a beautifully-appointed kitchen/meals area with new Westinghouse cooking appliances and dishwasher, spacious lounge leading out to a north-facing undercover balcony. Other highlights include split-system heating and cooling, LED lighting, internal laundry facilities, intercom/secure entry foyer, plus undercover parking space. Perfectly positioned, walking distance to North Essendon Village cafes and shops, Mt Alexander Road trams, Glenbervie Station, as well as easy access to freeway/Citylink. Apartment perfection!
Insights: 5/101 Glass Street, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2017 and 101 other 2 bedroom unit in Essendon have recently been sold.

Description:
Mission Accomplished
Beautifully renovated to exacting standards this larger than normal two bedroom single level residence is certain to leave a lasting impression. Located in a prized Essendon neighbourhood, opposite Buckley Park College grounds, it offers unbeatable lifestyle choices at your fingertips. Opening to immaculately presented interiors, the home immediately conveys a sense of style, space and comfort within an open plan living room and adjoining kitchen/meals zones where glass aspects flow to an easy care wraparound courtyard garden. A light filled kitchen hosts stainless steel cooking appliances, dishwasher, modern stone counters and large pantry with clever storage options. Oversized bedrooms offer built-in-robes. Complemented by stunning bathroom, gas heater, air-conditioner, solar electricity, alarm, awnings and automated carport. Only minutes from Keilor Road cafés, shops, schools and Buckley Park, while buses pass the door.

Address: G.06/324 Pascoe Vale Road Essendon VIC 3040
Description:
Entertainer’s Dream with Low Maintenance Lifestyle
INVESTORS WELCOME with 2 year 5% Rental Guarantee. $480per week
Whether you are looking for an ideal first home/downsizer or for consistent returns, this show-stopping two-bedroom apartment with HUGE undercover terrace is sure to impress. The generous proportions and secluded outdoor space are complimented by lock-up-and-go convenience within moments of Strathmore train station, parkland & popular Napier Street shops and cafes.
Stylish kitchen fitout with stainless steel appliances and trendy tiled splashback, huge pantry and study nook situated conveniently behind a concertina door (easily converted to extra storage). Walkthrough laundry leads to functional central bathroom with plentiful storage. Both bedrooms benefit from Eastern natural light/Morning Sun and large built in robes. While the 63 square metre terrace truly has to be seen to be believed. Situated at the rear of a boutique block, it is secure, private, and perfect for entertaining on warm summer afternoons.
Other features include video intercom, split system heating and cooling, secure FOB entry, carpark and storage cage.
This brand new, vacant apartment is not one to miss out on.
Also note NO STAMP DUTY payable & $10,000 First Home Buyer Grant available to those who qualify.
Agents in conjunction:
Jellis Craig – Robert Enes
0432 088 874
PAGAN RE – Ryan Pagan

Description:
Chic City Living, Convenience And Views
Experience easy living luxury, tantalising city views and superb amenity at your fingertips with this as new, one owner two bedroom apartment just a short walk from North Essendon Village cafes, restaurants and shops. Secured by lift and visual intercom entry, the property presents a safe, secure environment ideal for city professionals, downsizers or astute buyers after a convenient city base. Framed by vast glass aspects, spilling onto a full width, covered terrace boasting a northerly orientation, are radiant open plan living, meals zones maximising space and natural light with clever design. Quality finishes feature throughout a streamlined kitchen, and include stone counters, stylish cabinetry and stainless steel European appliances. Impeccably presented bedrooms boast built-in-robes with the main enjoying direct terrace access. Complemented by a pristine bathroom with laundry function, split-system, premium carpet, secure basement car space and large storage cage. Offering superb lifestyle choices near Lincoln Park, Rose Street Village, schools, trains, tram, CityLink and airports.

Description:
Family Lifestyle Package, Mar Lodge
A meticulous light filled federation replica, with extreme attention to detail, this family home, located on a corner block of one of Essendon’s premier pockets; enjoys close proximity to schools, transport and local cafés, in the coveted Mar Lodge Estate. The home offers diversity for family living, comprising 5 bedrooms, 2 of which are conveniently located at the back of the house with additional private side street entry and powder room; perfect for home office suite, extended family or play zone.
The entire living space, including formal lounge with period open fireplace, overlooks a timeless garden, including solar heated swimming pool, spa and outdoor entertaining area, which combines elegantly through to the open plan kitchen/living and formal lounge. A 3kW solar panel system is included, the existing owners have eliminated electricity costs due to careful selection of provider in conjunction with solar panels.
The kitchen is located central to the home overlooking the elegant outdoor garden, comprising Ilve oven, Fisher & Paykel double dishwasher and thermostat Rinnair water control and reverse osmosis water filter. Further family appeal is engaged with features including hydronic heating, refrigerative cooling, alarm, heated towel racks, master en-suite and large laundry with floor to ceiling storage space. There is direct entry to remote controlled double garage and backyard.
A thoughtfully planned family home with extreme attention to detail that offers diversity and lifestyle.
Insights: 10 McCracken Street, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2017 and 18 other 5 bedroom house in Essendon have recently been sold.

Description:
Premium Location, Café Lifestyle And Views
Breathtaking views, space and low maintenance qualities make this stunning two bedroom luxury apartment an excellent choice for astute purchasers. Vast floor-to-ceiling glass aspects fill the home’s expansive open plan living domain with natural light and allow seamless access onto a full width balcony perfect for relaxing, alfresco entertaining and savouring spectacular sunsets. Luxury finishes, such as stone counters, glass splashback wall and stainless steel Smeg appliances, complement a modern streamlined kitchen ensuring appeal for gourmet home cooks. Two beautifully appointed bedrooms boast built-in-robes and share a luxe bathroom flaunting walk-in shower, floating stone top vanity and mirrored cabinets. Premium extras comprise foyer/lift/visual intercom entry, split-system, European laundry and basement car space with storage cage. With cafés, restaurants, shops, an array of public transport, elite schools and sporting facilities on its doorstep.

Description:
Lifestyle Fulfilment In Leafy Surrounds
With Lincoln Park, North Essendon Village, Rose Street's boutique shops and cafes, Mt Alexander Road tram and Essendon train station just a walk away, this single bedroom apartment is certainly placed for lifestyle enjoyment. A spacious interior presents a light filled, open plan living domain appreciating a tranquil leafy outlook over a large private courtyard. A similar view enhances the double bedroom which additionally incorporates floor to ceiling built-in wardrobes and accesses a tidy bathroom with a shower over the bath. There's also electric panel heaters, an intercom and coveted off-street parking. Add to that a premium location in the heart of beautiful Essendon and strong investor, new buyer and downsizer appeal is inevitable.

Description:
Sensational Space and a Perfect Position!
In a sought-after Essendon neighbourhood walking distance to schools, transport options and the wide open spaces of Buckley Park, this modern residence offers broad appeal with its floorplan versatility, quality features and private surrounds. More house than townhouse, the home's light-filled interior showcases three bedrooms (extra-large master with WIR and stylish ensuite), main bathroom and third WC, front lounge through to the open-plan living/dining area and granite-bench kitchen with Blanco cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other highlights include ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, ducted vacuum, polished hardwood floors, full-size laundry, linen storeroom and additional under-stair storage, plus two balconies, private rear courtyard and large front garden with high fenceline all-round. Complete with internally-accessed garage (r/c) and additional off-street parking space via gated driveway, it's also close to Buckley Street shops and cafes, primary and secondary schools, local buses and Keilor Road trams, as well as easy access to Citylink. Zoned to Buckley Park College, also close to Our Lady of the Nativity Catholic PS, Aberfeldie PS, St Bernard's College, Ave Maria Catholic College, St Columba's College, Lowther Hall, Penleigh and Essendon Grammar.
Photo I.D required at all inspections.
Insights: 1/20 Cooper Street, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2017 and 84 other 3 bedroom house in Essendon have recently been sold.

Description:
Exceptional Locale And Easy Contemporary Living
Offering an opportunity to gain a foothold into a prized location, this two bedroom apartment (in a boutique block of six) is an enticing proposition for downsizers and first home buyers. Offering a stylish modern kitchen, with chic Caesarstone benches and good storage, and generous open plan dining and lounging zones. Two sun-drenched bedrooms, each with built in robes, share a contemporary bathroom with its Caesarstone benchtop and separate shower and soaking tub, ideal for lapping up quiet times of relaxation. With freshly painted walls and new carpet throughout, an electric wall heather and split system air conditioner, a separate laundry (a rare find for apartment living), a secure gated entry with intercom and off street parking for one car, this impeccably presented residence would also spark the interest of those seeking a rental investment property in the area. With a city bound tramline within walking distance and Essendon train station a few minute's drive away, enjoy Sunday strolls around Lincoln Park and coffee at trendy cafes in the North Essendon Shopping precinct.
Insights: 5/11 Spencer Street, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2017 and 101 other 2 bedroom unit in Essendon have recently been sold.

STYLISH START OR EASY INVESTMENT
A terrific entry into Essendon or blue-chip addition to any property portfolio, this top-floor treat is perfect either way with its updated features, abundance of natural light and unbeatable location. Impressive interior showcases two double bedrooms (both with built-in robes) and stylish central bathroom, open-design lounge/dining area enhanced by a contemporary-style kitchen complete with tiled splashbacks and stainless steel cooking appliances. Other features of the apartment include internal laundry facilities, intercom/secure entry foyer, plus off-street parking space at the rear. Walking distance to Glenbervie Station, it's also close to Mt Alexander Road trams, Salmon Reserve, Windy Hill Fitness Centre, Napier Street cafes and shops. Inspection a must!

Description:
Sensational Space, Perfect Position
The Mill - in one of Essendon's best warehouse conversions, this top-floor townhouse invokes a New York state of mind with its expansive two-level floorplan, top-quality features and spectacular views to the city and beyond. High ceilings and an abundance of natural light throughout, the home's distinctive interior showcases three bedrooms (all with mirrored robes), deluxe ensuite, main bathroom and guest powder room (third WC). Add to this a stone-bench kitchen with Smeg appliances and spacious open-plan living/dining area with stacker doors revealing a wide balcony to relax, entertain and enjoy the breathtaking outlook. Other highlights include a large laundry, split-system heating and cooling (all bedrooms and living area), polished hardwood floors, plus video intercom, lift to secure foyer and two undercover car spaces. In a prized Windy Hill location moments from Napier Street cafes and shops, it's also close to Fletcher Street trams and Essendon Station, Windy Hill Fitness Centre as well as the area's renowned schools.
Insights: 318/87-89 Raleigh Street, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2017 and 24 other 3 bedroom unit in Essendon have recently been sold.

Description:
FERN-NOOK
Established in 1883 by Thomas Noble, FERN-NOOK is one of Essendon's original homes graciously presiding over a beautiful 620 square meter allotment.
(approximately)
This is an outstanding opportunity to acquire what must be considered one of the districts finest examples of the bygone era.
Offering a flexible floor plan with plentiful accommodation including 10 substantial rooms in the main part of the residence. Excellent car accommodation via the side drive to a double garage and additional utilities room.
Exceptional lead-light windows, marble and timber mantel pieces, towering ornate ceilings, original cellar, grand arched hallways and slate roof all reflect the eras elegance.
In an exceptional family location on Windy Hill, with transport, cafes, excellent public and private schools all within the vicinity.
Promising a coveted Essendon lifestyle, this grand home will appeal to professionals and growing families who appreciate space, style and the abundant charm of yesteryear.
Insights: 38 Hoddle Street, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2017 and 46 other 4 bedroom house in Essendon have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish, Serene and Enviably Central
An unbeatable location with the world at your doorstep, this first-floor Roseville apartment offers an idyllic inner-urban lifestyle/investment with its clever design, quality features and secure surrounds. As-new interior boasts two bedrooms (large master) both with BIRs, deluxe ensuite and main central bathroom, study alcove, open lounge/dining area enhanced by a well-appointed kitchen with Ariston cooking appliances and dishwasher. Add to this split-system heating and cooling, stone benchtops and vanities, undercover balcony (from the lounge), plus intercom/secure entry, lower-level car space and storage cage. Instant access to cafes and restaurants, shops and supermarkets, Lincoln Park and Mt Alexander Road trams, as well as close proximity to Essendon Station, airports and CBD via freeway/Citylink. Perfect low-maintenance living or blue-chip investing!
Inspection by appointment only.

POTENTIAL-PACKED ENTRY INTO ESSENDON!
Full of surprises, this light-filled apartment sets itself apart with its surprisingly spacious design, immediate comfort and incredible scope to modernize and enhance a unique opportunity for home buyers and investors alike! Description:
LOOKING FOR SOMETHING DIFFERENT
With older style charm and generous room sizes this expansive two bedroom villa unit in an attractive location is sure to appeal. Features include an open plan kitchen meals lounge area, separate WC, central bathroom, large courtyard, heating and cooling systems and under cover parking.
In close proximity to schools, shops, restaurants, transport and easy access to the Tullamarine Freeway and City Link.

Description:
Land, Location, Potential - What an Opportunity!
Enjoyed by the one family for nearly 60 years, this much-loved weatherboard home occupies an enormous block of land (800sqm+) in one of Essendon's premier streets offering a world of opportunities to expand, renew or possibly redevelop (STCA). Spotless throughout, the home's current accommodation includes three bedrooms (all with robes) and central bathroom, front lounge and adjoining dining room through to the kitchen/meals area and rear sunroom. Add to this gas heating, a/c, original Art Deco ceilings and stained timberwork, plus a simply enormous east-facing backyard garden complete with storage shed and garage via side driveway. Close to primary and secondary schools, Keilor Road trams and cafes, shops and supermarkets, Buckley Park recreational facilities as well as easy access to Citylink. Land approx 16m x 50.3m - 804sqm. Just imagine the possibilities!
Insights: 66 Roberts Street, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2017 and 84 other 3 bedroom house in Essendon have recently been sold.

It’s your choice but either way you’ll benefit from the winning combination of potential on a valuable block of land. Close to schools, transport, shopping and parklands, opportunity knocks here…

Description:
LOW-MAINTENANCE STYLE, BLUE-CHIP LOCALE
In an impeccably-maintained block, this attractive front villa delivers a rare easy-living lifestyle opportunity of privacy and convenience with its generous floorplan, quality features and exclusive Essendon location. Beyond its private brick-fenced front garden, the home's pristine interior comprises two bedrooms (large master) both with BIRs, central bathroom and separate WC, light-filled lounge through to the dining area and adjoining kitchen. Other features include gas heating and split-system a/c, full-size laundry, plus north-facing rear courtyard and lock-up garage via gated driveway. An ideal first home, blue-chip investment or value-packed downsize option in a wonderfully quiet yet central location with close proximity to local parks, public transport options, shops and cafes, as well as the area's renowned primary and secondary schools. Don't miss this one!
Insights: 1/2 Banchory Street, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2017 and 33 other 2 bedroom house in Essendon have recently been sold.

Description:
Land of Opportunity!
Essendon's exclusive Windy Hill precinct provides the perfect setting for this unique family home on approx 920sqm of land offering a world of possibilities for home buyers and developers alike with its immediate function and outstanding future potential (STCA). Spacious and solid, the home's current floorplan includes four bedrooms (all with BIRs) and two bathrooms, spacious lounge, dining room, timber-cabinet kitchen and large enclosed patio/entertaining area. Step outside to discover the home's greatest asset - an enormous north-facing backyard with garage via gated driveway, two additional carports and plenty of room to expand. City-bound trams virtually at your doorstep, it's also walking distance to Essendon Station, Napier Street cafes and shops, Queens Park as well as the area's elite schools. Renovate, rebuild or redevelop - what an amazing opportunity!
Insights: 24 Fletcher Street, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2017 and 46 other 4 bedroom house in Essendon have recently been sold.
